name: Nucleus
description:
Nucleus Networks is an IT company that specializes in the implementation and management of IT services. Their team of experts becomes an extension of their clients’ organizations to deliver industry-leading solutions with the best practices and expertise they have gathered through the years.
As winners of BC’s Best Workplaces, and recognized as one of North America’s top Managed IT Services Providers, they empower kids and guide them to become intellectual explorers through their Tech for Kids program.
READ MORE...
